item.title: Ichest bug
item.author: invalid@example.com (Diamon0117)
item.dc:creator: Diamon0117
item.content:encoded: When I attach a hopper to the Ichest, it doesn't automatically take items. After a lot of trial and error, I found out that the items only get in once you break the hopper, then repeat the process to get items in. This is in Opskyblock

item.title: OP SkyBlock Guide - Poor to Rich.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Tuumans)
item.dc:creator: Tuumans
item.content:encoded:
As I've noticed, many people have been complaining about the lack of a guide on how to start playing OP SkyBlock and earn money in it. Therefore, I've decided to create this thread to teach the most basic things.

How to start?
- When you've just started playing, the best way to earn some money is to reach MINER LEVEL 1 so you can access the mines and sell ores in the /Shop. To earn Level you just have to mine some blocks. You can get better mines by...

Read more

item.title: Random guide part 1
item.author: invalid@example.com (ASSASSINX)
item.dc:creator: ASSASSINX
item.content:encoded:
So this a guide which has a random collection of things you need to do in opskyblock to earn and level up faster.

Things you should do:-
  • Vote everyday as they are a req for /level
  • Don't throw away any mineworld mob drops as they might not be useful now but later you might need them.
  • Don't accept any TPA req, as it might be a trap.
  • Donot sell your items to someone in dms, ask about its prices in the chat (they might be ripping you off) . Also don't...

Read more

item.title: Best way to grind exp
item.author: invalid@example.com (ACV1)
item.dc:creator: ACV1
item.content:encoded:
So, there's a lot of player with like 100m, 200m Or even in billion exp. So, I'm curious how do they grind so much exp. Like what's the best way to grind exp. Ik that eblaze give the most exp and you can increase the amount of exp you getting by gold kit, inquistive 5, experience 1, spawner upgrades, exp boosters. Is there anything else that I'm missing out?
Edit: I checked that I gained 1m exp in 6 min 30 second while wearing gold set, exp booster, experience 1 and inquistive 5 on sword

item.title: Island value decreased
item.author: invalid@example.com (ACV1)
item.dc:creator: ACV1
item.content:encoded: So, my island value was around 3-4 trillion, and it ranked at 96 place but today I decided to change their location to somewhere else so I mined them and my island decreased to 32b and ranked at 296 rank which I knew but when I placed the spawner to somewhere else the island value didn't increased at all, and it stayed at 32b. Anyone know why?
